title: New: Galapagos – Feel Things Inside
body:
18-year-old Phoenician Jacob McNaughton, aka **[Galapagos](http://galapagossound.tumblr.com/)** has been turning heads in the blog world for a little while now. In a word where moody and drug-infused Rn’B is all the rage, it’s actually pretty refreshing to hear someone go out of his way to create something as clean and sugary as possible. His new cut, **_Feel Things Inside,_** is a rework of **Jennifer Hudson**‘s “No One Gonna Love You”. It’s almost obnoxiously pitch-shifted, stuttering and wild, yet it also manages to be utterly infectious.

Stream and D/L below.
